column4: @MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk How the fuck did democrats get in this convo? The UNIA papers speak for themselves. He loved racist white ppl. Helped them sell 17k of the racist writings to blk ppl. All talking about relocating to Africa. He was doing their bidding.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk So now black empowerment is racist. You are something special. I do agree, "The UNIA papers speak for themselves."\n\nThank you

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Read a book? You should try comprehending one. MG worked with white supremacist. He was doing their bidding. You still haven't answered the question on how did MG sustain himself when all of his businesses failed. They were not profitable.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Now he was doing their bidding. OK guy. You have been dishonest this whole time. To see a black man attack another black man based on the hearsay of white supremacists sad. He sustained himself the same way any leader does, and Garvey had more than one business. Stop.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk You are projecting and anyone who looks back on this will see for themselves. He openly challenged white supremacy, which is why our government went against him. You on the other hand only hate him because some undercover democrats said so. Now please. GTFOH

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk You continue to say "ADOS leaders", when it was a handful of people who had their own issues that did not agree with Garvey's methods. History repeats itself. Where Ice Cube was "Called out" for attempting to work with Trump. Now we got Biden in office. Read a book guy, and GTFOH
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Well ADOS leaders felt differently and he came to America attacked them and worked with white supremacist.\n\nDude you hate yourself.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk I think that you get it now. Even tho you won't admit it. He was a grifter. Had a lot of mouth for ADOS leaders and no spine when it came to white supremacy. He praised them and worked with them. And as you like to say GTFOH. P.S. you hate yourself.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk My point is that black people want our own nation/territory/land/city where we make the rules, own, control the resources and prosper. Understand?
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Again, the early 1900's was a MUCH different time, and we all want a "WAKANDA". He felt it would be best to go to Africa at that time. Period.
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk I don't want Wakanda, The Wakandans where anti-blk and anti-Blk American. What movie did you watch?
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk However, you should show some respect. MG lived during a time that was extremely difficult for blacks, even AFTER slavery ended.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk MG needed to show some respect having been fresh off the boat coming to America and speaking to and collaborating with white supremacist. Attacking ADOS who knew the environment better than his relocate to Africa ass. ADOS been living an extremely difficult time b4 MG

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Dude. You are actually readung. Please continue, stop asking questions and continue READING. Also, I would never imply that ALL (or even most descendants of American Slaves) are boule. The part about MG pulling chess moves, yes. You dont have to agree with everything MG did.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Dude you hate yourself. Earlier in this thread you called the Blk Americans who were calling him out, FBI informants and Boule. Neither of which are compliments. But you love the White supremacist loving fresh off the boat Jamaican.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk And why did he feel Blk ppl needed to leave? Since the country was built off of ADOS and their ancestors, why isn't our reward the land is yours and you white ppl leave. Cuz his grifting ass was not gonna talk to white ppl like he talked to ADOS W.E.B Duboise.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Garvey was pulling a chess move but I think you already understand  that. Even in the work you present here, you see clearly that Garvey had BLACK people in mind and was looking out for our vest interest as best as he could see.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk So all of ADOS are backstabbing boule FBI informants  and Marcus is talking to, supporting and praising white supremacist and those are chess moves. \n\nDude you hate yourself.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk American white supremacy.... You do not seem to understand that white supremacy was GLOBAL and the white supremacists (who were not indigenous to the Americas) carried out white supremacy from Canada to  South America. Please, continue with your education.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk White supremacy is global but that doesn't mean it operates exactly the same everywhere. For example the Caribbean didn't have a Jim Crow period. Dude you hate yourself. Marcus Garvey was a grifter. Get over it.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Now tell me again how some guy from Jamaica who only had been in America for a few yrs understands American white supremacy better than the Blk Americans. W.E.B wasn't the sellout it was Garvey.\n\nDude you hate yourself.  Garvey was a grifter.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Garvey praising the racist again and to arouse his ppl to support sending Blk Americans to Africa a place that the overwhelming majority had not been. They had been here generations. The Marcus Garvey and Universal Negro Improvement Association Papers. https://t.co/c2vGrUEMlp

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Now he comes to America and decides to work with White Supremacist doing their bidding and say this to the white supremacist that W.E.B will twist what the supremacist is saying and use it as propaganda. He goes on to pledge his full support the white supremacist. https://t.co/OjExQgnt3a

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Cox and Bilbo both were racist and Eugenicist. But Garvey was working with them. They probably were funding him too since they all agree that Blk Americans should be relocated to Africa. Who gave Garvey the authority? Garvey was a grifter.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk A black man.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk While he was arguing with W.E.B Duboise a BLACK MAN, he was praising white men,  racist and eugenicist, who were actively working against Blk Americans. I wonder if they put money in his pocket to do their bidding.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Lol, I see you digging though. I will give you some credit for following my advice and actually reading. Problem, you have a long way to go, if you are sincere. Please, continue your research and stop following weak minded people.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk No, the problem is you still trying to hold on to Garvey the Grifter. You still haven't answered how was Garvey surviving with all of the businesses he started failed. Non were profitable. Where was the PW ship and the money for it?
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Do you know why he said that? Context is key buddy. Like I said. READ.
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Ok explain it to me.
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk He got here 1916 and thinks he knows what was best for Blk Americans which was to relocate to Africa which was what  the white man wanted.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk 1916 was a different time, and white supremacy was and remains global

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk "In 1924, Cox formed an unlikely alliance with the black nationalist Marcus Garvey based on their shared belief that the only way to save the races was for African Americans to relocate to Africa." WTF was he to even suggest. https://t.co/DgC4Knkdgf

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk “I regard the Klan, the Anglo-Saxon clubs and White American societies, as far as the Negro is concerned, as better friends of the race than all other groups of hypocritical whites put together.” - Marcus Garvey. \n\nThe Klan He said, as in the Ku Klux Klan

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Late in his life Garvey praised Cox and Bilbo, stating that "These two white men have done wonderfully well for the Negro and should not be forgotten." Cox in turn dedicated his 1925 book Let My People Go to Garvey, and referred to their relation as a "spiritual understanding."
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Don't be a hater all your life.\nhttps://t.co/XtbE8vz9b4
Lol you can't make this up https://t.co/b0c0uM6raL https://t.co/FzFDpdFgQo
@_theghettomonk @Kartur888

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk "Garvey was arrested on mail fraud charges for selling stock in a ship that had not yet been purchased for the Black Star Line." That was the PW ship. Blk Americans were asking where's the ship. And he never produced it nor the money. I wonder how he continued to survive with ..
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk ...previous endeavors all failed. They were not profitable. So how was he sustaining himself? Where was he getting money? Oh I know... grifting poor Blk Americans.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk You are the follow/swallower who fails to support his ppl. Instead you support and an immigrant grifter because you hate yourself. Garvey wasn't even allowed in Africa. Why happened to the money for the Phyllis Wheatley Ship. Show me the ship. Blk Americans were asking to see it.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk No, YOU believe Umar is a grifter. I never said that, YOU did. Also, I am a black man speaking about black people. You are someone who follows and swallows the rhetoric of FAILED leadership. I wanted to agree to disagree, but you are all over the place. Go read a book, and GTFOH!

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Your problem is that you are a self hating Blk American who wishes he was something other than Blk American. You believe that Umar (American) is a grifter, the Americans who were calling out Garvey were backstabbers and Garvey a Jamaican had the best intention. You hate yourself.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk You know what, because you had me revisit Mr. Cookie crush for a good laugh. I'm gonna agree to disagree. I believe that much of the ADUNCE problem with Garvey is that he was a pro black Jamaican that holds respect among black Americans and it goes against their narrative. Peace https://t.co/P4lp8hCanG

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Because they are making a film about him doesn't mean he was not a grifter. And Garvey didn't become who ppl praise him to be today until years after his death. Get real dude. You are just a self hating groupie who lives in fantasy land.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk I'll say that it's not looking good for him. Although I think he was sincere at one point, he has ego problems and may be in over his head.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Having said that, nobody getting ready to make no movie about that man. Lmao https://t.co/h4LEQKLbMH

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Made it up? Read your history. They are getting ready to make a film about him. Yes, black people loved and appreciate what Garvey stood for even if we do not agree with his methods. You decided to show contempt for him based on the words of Strappy. As far as Umar goes....

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk You made that up that most Blk Americans loved Garvey.  where is the data that proves that. And if ppl loved him that doesn't mean he was not a grifter. Ppl still like Dr.Umar and he is the same, a grifter. You just think lowly of Blk Americans and you hate yourself.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk No. You want to attribute that to me so badly, but no. What you forget is that MOST black American loved Garvey, because Garvey loved his people. You made the mistake of following opportunistic ADUNCE leadership and you are now several tweets deep in your own stupidity. F O H

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk You have consistently shown that you think Blk Americans are back stabbing and are not smart. You think that it was everyone else that was the problem and not Garvey. If you are Blk American you are a self hater. You hate yourself.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk The Boule are a bunch of educated black Americans. Thats like saying Roland Martin called someone out do that person must be wrong. You have consistently shown that you do not read, and cannot be bothered to study your own history. You can GTFOH with your made up Strappy history.

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk These were educated Blk Americans who were calling him out. It's just you don't think much of Blk Americans that they are able to think. Some guy from Jamaica knew about American racism better than the Blk ppl who were experiencing it. You are a self hating man child. GTFOH

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Only a child would take white supremacy's word that Marcus Garvey was anything other  than a hero to black people, nit because he was "Grifting", but because he was real. Check yourself before you fix your fingers to type such stupidity. 5 dolla indian receipts, F O H

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk You have an ego problem. Who cares that you don't think much of me. Wtf are you? Earlier you said that I have no clout as if you are City Councilman or something. Who cares that you do have respect for me. I don't even know who the fuck you are. I mean really dude.  Ur a child
@_theghettomonk This started with that movie Denzel's son was in now every black leader or movement movie is "look at it through the lens of the government agency." I don't want it.

@JoshBass2020 @jasdye @obidagawd1 @_theghettomonk @ToriGlass Then maybe the point is to make collectives impossible by sewing distrust. So the lesson is if you can’t trust anyone, why bother organizing/resisting.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk I do not think much of YOU. Garvey actually built something that white supremacy found to be a threat. Go pay your dues to the ADOS org founders. Nothing that you have created actually helps black people. One last time, show proof or G T F O H!

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk What you are is a SELF HATER. You don't think much of Blk Americans you think other blks are smarter. You are choosing to believe the grifter swindling poor blk ppl out of money. Garvey is no better than the FBI. Using poor blk ppls money to enrich himself.

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk Look, I'm at work but again, what YOU just posted is TRASH. YOU are choosing to believe the FBI and an INFORMANT over what is common knowledge of the people. You fail. Get proof or F O H

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk You would rather believe in the Jamaican than the Blk Americans who were calling him out for his grifting. If you are a Blk American descendant of war prisoners, you hate yourself. You obviously didn't click on the link. https://t.co/Uqp3KxqOz5

@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk You don't have any clout, or respect. You are not effecting black society in a positive way. You are parroting WS/LGBTQ talking points about a black man who was sincere about loving black people. Who literally have no proof. Just typing. F O H
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk Obviously you are the one who is clueless to think that you are reading the proper info. Maybe you should grab a drink, cry and sing it out. https://t.co/QqYakfQIy9
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk You need to actually read about people and stop following weak willed nobody's. You are actually the clueless one. Foh.
@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk I wonder why we know about the grifter from Jamaica , who the Jamaican ppl didn't even listen to, but we don't know about...... https://t.co/Uqp3KxqOz5

@MrBlack27073911 @_theghettomonk African countries wouldn't even allow him to visit. He swindle Blk Americans out of money. He had an Blk American killed for questioning where was the money. You don't have a clue. He was a grifter.
@RealLighthead @_theghettomonk You are a welp compared to Garvey. He was about it. What about you?
@_theghettomonk Marcus Garvey was a grifter! #ADOS

@daljordin @_theghettomonk Marcus Garvey was a grifter, so I don't think he was betrayed. Some African countries wouldn't even allow him. But I get your point. They are trying to say Blk  American ppl are responsible for our own destruction.

@RealLighthead @daljordin @_theghettomonk Marcus Garvey was on a whole different level from you. You aren't even qualified to speak on him. Learn your history and learn yourself, before you speak on Garvey.
